sense.name: An emotional state of sharing the feelings of others or of support or loyalty.
sense.examples: My sympathies are with the allies. I knew I could count on her undying sympathy. I have nothing but sympathy for you.

sense.name: A relation of affinity or harmony between people.
sense.examples: The two of them were in close sympathy. We are in sympathy together. They abandoned their jobs in sympathy with one another.
